page.title: 01GENERAL FEATURES/OWERMOIGNE
page.content: THIS BLOCK IS IN THE{HEART}OF RURAL {DORSET}.IT HAS SCATTERED ARABLE FARMS AND PASTURELAND,AND A MAIN VILLAGE.IN {DOMESDAY}TIMES IT HAD A MANOR HOUSE WITH LAND,A MILL,SEVEN VILLEINS AND SIX COTTAGERS.IT REMAINED AN ESTATE VILLAGE,WITH LITTLE DEVELOPMENT UNTIL {1926}WHEN THE MAJOR LAND OWNERS{SOLD} MOST OF THE VILLAGE.THERE HAS BEEN SOME DEVELOPMENT BUT{IT STILL RETAINS {ITS STREAM,THATCHED COTTAGES,AND MANOR {HOUSE}.THE{SCHOOL}DRAWS ITS CHILDREN FROM{OWERMOIGNE, CROSSWAYS 2 MILES {NORTH-A NEW HOUSING ESTATE,MORETON {3 MILES E.N.E.AND HOLWORTH 2 MILES S.} TUMULI AND A LONG BARROW ON THE SOUTHERN RIDGE ARE EVIDENCE OF {ANCIENT SETTLEMENT},WHILST MORE RECENTLY{SMUGGLING}WAS A LUCRATIVE {PASTIME}.TODAY IT IS THE{NURSERIES}AND {TOURISM THAT BRING PEOPLE TO OUR AREA.
